data.message: SERIOUSLY? I am mot  sure why you  think anyone would really like it . News feed is narrow....and ads are wider. There is space available so please use it to spread out the news -feed. I am sorry but that is how I feel.

replies.message: i agree its like someone threw the screen in a compactor and smushed it together. no breathing room.
totally agree.. i don't care about the ads.. never did and never will.. so why did they makes it wider taking from the news feed area??!!!!!!!!!!!!
Well they making money with the ads. I guess that is okay it's business. However there is space to widen the news feed. I am sure they know to do it. :)
Sigh...
I think this is a pretty legit suggestion.
well said!
i bought a 25in screen you have made it a 19 put me back where i was
Right!!!! I want s dislike option along w many other issues.
I hope they will listen to us. :)
I also do not like that the news feed is smaller and the adds are bigger....at the very least bring back a larger news feed!!

I agree too.  I liked it the way it was before! Move it to the right.  Put back the pages, etc. you had on the left.  Now can only see them when I'm at the home screen.  If I want to go to a group is not as before when I just look to the left.  Also, when a page is open the notifications cover half the page.  This is totally RIDICULOUS!  I don't understand why you changed, it was great the way it was!!!
move the scroll down 1" on this page and 75% of the screen is empty glaring white space.  DOH! another bad update :(
I thought it was just me, that I accidentally reset something- Why would we want bigger ads?
can some help ? I can't get my fb home page.
help!!! I can't get my fb home page to come up.
help !!! I can't get my FB home page to come up..
Regina...this happend yesterday to a few people I know. WHILE the updates are done. This will be. Soon it will come up again. :)
Even the store is owned by a Pysche...
I agree!!!
Too many ads!
I hate the change as someone else said the news feed is smaller...i have to zoom my page to 125 so i can see the news feed better because it is full of ads....
excellent point.  page is now very choppy.  Needs to be balanced and reduce the size of the pictures.  For pete's sake, we could see the pictures before just fine
There is enough ads down the side, why down the middle???? Hate it, but our opinions don't seem to matter.
and chat is so small
Facebook "A site were people can connect with ads" IT should be PEOPLE
